listings.comment: Working with Kiril was an absolute pleasure! He went above and beyond to ensure I was happy with my website, and his skills are nothing short of magical. His creativity, talent, and vision exceeded my expectations by a mile. If you're looking for someone to bring your website to life with expert craftsmanship and innovation, I highly recommend working with him!

Kirill is awesome -- this was an exceptional experience.  Kirill's gorgeous work speaks for itself, but what you can only know from working with him is how he really gets what the client is looking for and is able to turn your ideas and vision into a reality.  We love our website and have received non stop compliments.  You should definitely hire him -- he's a bargain for the quality of work you get.  Excellent communication, expectation setting, and helpfulness too!

Kirill was great to work with. I had an idea of what I wanted but Kirill made it come to life. My team was slow to get Kirill what he needed but he was patient and was able to help us on our own pace. I would definitely work with him again in the future. Very professional and I'm very happy with the finished site.
Second time hiring for website overhaul and couldn't be happier! Every few years we need a refresh and will look forward to hiring again in the near future!

Kirill Illenkov has truly outdone himself with ANOTHER incredible website redesign! His work is impeccable—professional, well-documented, and completely bug-free. Plus, his politeness and proactive communication make working with him a breeze 👍. I highly recommend Kirill for any web development needs!
